Notes.Text:
This update for samba fixes the following issues:

- ZeroLogon: An elevation of privilege was possible with some configurations when an attacker established
a vulnerable Netlogon secure channel connection to a domain controller, using the Netlogon Remote Protocol (MS-NRPC) 
(CVE-2020-1472, bsc#1176579).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when an attacker establishes a vulnerable Netlogon secure channel connection to a domain controller, using the Netlogon Remote Protocol (MS-NRPC), aka 'Netlogon Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.
